Title: music control
Description:
The music-control program is one part of the music-control system. With this Programm and a Chrome Addon you can control the player of many internet music stream sites (last.fm, wearehunted.com, grooveshark.com, hypem.com, youtube.com playlists) with the keyboard. Developed in C#/WPF.

This code is OpenSource that everyone can see that the program do not more than looking for pressed key and send a command to the Chrome Extenstion.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The music-control program is one part of the music-control system. With this Programm and a Chrome Addon you can control the player of many internet music stream sites (last.fm, wearehunted.com, grooveshark.com, hypem.com, youtube.com playlists) with the keyboard. Developed in C#/WPF.

 

Avast shows a virus warning. This is a false positiv. The code is open source. Everyone can check.
